{{ product.productId }} {{ product.name }} {{ product.description }} {{ product.color }} {{ product.unitPrice }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './productlist.component.html' }) export class ProductListComponent { public productList: Product[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'api/Products').subscribe(result => { this.productList = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Product { productId: number; name: string; description: string; color: string; unitPrice: number; }
